FCCANALYSIS-TEST(1) fccanalysis-test man page FCCANALYSIS-TEST(1)

NAME

fccanalysis-test – test FCCAnalyses framework

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis test [-h | --help] [-R TESTS_REGEX] [-E EXCLUDE_REGEX] [-j PARALLEL]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis-test will test the whole or a part of the FCC analysis framework.

It is not intended as a replacement for running ctest command directly in the build directory, it is just convenience shortcut.

OPTIONS

-h, --help
Prints short help message and exits.
-R TESTS_REGEX
Specify subset of tests to be run.
-E EXCLUDE_REGEX
Specify subset of tests to ignore.
-j PARALLEL, --parallel PARALLEL
Number of tests running in parallel (equivalent to `ctest -j`).

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis(1), fccanalysis-build(7), ctest(1)

BUGS

Many

AUTHORS

There are many contributors to the FCCAnalyses framework, but the principal authors are:
Clement Helsens
Valentin Volkl
Gerardo Ganis
